name: Fall Flip
description:
This is Fall Flip, a short, autumn themed platformer that can be played in either Normal Mode or Flipped Mode.  Normal Mode is a typical 2D platformer, while Flipped Mode is the same level but upside down! It even has a separate set of collectibles to find. Speaking of collectables, Fall Flip is scattered with symbols called runes, which must be found and returned to their associated runestone. This is not necessary to complete the level, but the runes make for a fun extra challenge!

Thank you to these sources for compensating for my lack of artistic skill:

Title Screen Music from https://www.zapsplat.com

8-bit March by Twin Musicom

Player Character modified from: https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero
